text: hi everybody my name is Esther and in
this video I want to tell you about a
horrible trip that I had recently last
week my good friend from California
who's living in Korea asked me to go to
the beach with her so she planned
everything and all I had to do was go
with her she decided we would go to
Kangnam so I packed my bags I met her at
the bus terminal and we left at 10
o'clock in the morning
unfortunately we forgot that it was the
peak season for you know traveling
especially to that area for the nice
beaches so we left at 10 o'clock in the
morning but the trip took over five
hours so we arrived around 3:30 in the
afternoon well we arrived it was very
hot we were ready to start swimming so
we got on a bus and we were going to a
small kind of quiet beach and the
neighbor app told us it would take about
thirty minutes by bus so we were waiting
we were on the bus and 4050 minutes
passed but we didn't look any closer to
the beach in fact it looked like we were
going up a mountain so my friend asked
the bus driver and we found that we
actually got on the bus on the wrong
side of the street so we had no choice
but to wait until the bus turned around
and we just went to the closest beach
that we could find and even when we got
off the bus it took 20 minutes to walk
to that beach and by the time we arrived
it was already about six o'clock
everybody was getting ready to leave the
water was cold we didn't have time to do
much we just play
in the water a little bit took some
pictures and we had to go that night we
decided to just sleep at a ginger bum my
back hurt it was so hot and at 3:30 in
the morning some loud people came in and
woke us up so the next day we left at
about 6:00 in the morning it only took
two and a half hours but I was so glad
to be home and I hope none of you ever
experienced a horrible trip like that
okay well thanks for watching and I'll
see you guys next time bye
you
